good game make big brain

This game is my childhood, it just makes my day everytime i play it. When Valved used to post games like these it was mostly always a classic. The first Portal was good with interesting design for gameplay but a bit of a dull story.

Now motherfuckers we have Portal 2 which truly is a masterpiece.

It has the same portal mechanics with added functions like goo and anti gravity beams, but thats not the reason i love it.
No i love the charactors and the story.
It adds soo much more for who you are and what your going through while telling you more about Glados and who she worked for and for a mute main charactor it tells alot for what kind of person you are.

In all if you havent played this game yet, fucking do it. Its great, its fun, it also has a multiplayer which is also pretty good, community support and a story that still holds up to this day.
This game is one of my most favorite games I have played and itâ€™s beautifully made with fun puzzles and funny humor, I really wish there would be a 3rd game but sadly valve canâ€™t count to 3.

Valve is epic, very good sequel epic story runs on potat0

If Portal is the tip of the gaming pyramid, then Portal 2 is the little flag sticking out from the top of it. I can't describe how much you'll fall in love with this game if you buy it. Make sure to play the first Portal game first, though; it makes a huge difference in how you play the sequel.

10000/10 would be brutally insulted by AI again.
Fun game to play with a friend. If you have that one friend who thinks they're smarter than you just play this game with them and you'll realize that you're both dumb. 10/10
I don't know what is more entertaining. Listening to Cave Johnson's lines on YouTube for ten hours straight or fucking with my mates portal. It really is a hard decision.

Portal 2 is definitely one of the best games I have ever played. The puzzle are an improvement over the original, due to some new mechanics and a longer story. Even though it is now nine years old, it still looks good, and plays well. The story is funny, well written and has lots of unexpected parts, and the community test chambers means that even after finishing the campaign, you have an infinite number of things to play. This game is definitely worth buying.
[b]10/10[/b]
Excellent jeu
This game is very good, i love how the effort is spent into it, i do reccomend buying this, its worth it,

This is one of my favorite video games of all time. Bought it on sale for 99c which might as well have been robbery for how much I enjoyed it. Unique puzzle game with lots of variety in the puzzles and a great overarching story with good characters (Wheatley is great). The puzzles are challenging after the tutorial levels that teach you how to use the portal gun and the mechanics and tools are introduced well. I'm pretty sure I played the whole single-player campaign over like 3-4 days. Can't comment on the co-op as I haven't played through it yet. The soundtrack is great and the graphics are good and ran super smoothly even on my laptop. HIGHLY recommend

Wheatley bad. GlaDOS bad. Cake lie. Aperture good.

A masterful sequel to an amazing game, Portal 2 takes everything good from Portal and makes it better. The story is surprisingly good for the genre (though admittedly it's nothing to the likes of the great stories of our age), the puzzles and characters are fantastic, and co-op is a blast. Almost anyone with even a faint interest in gaming will probably like this one.
One of the best games I have ever played!
Love the design of this masterpiece to the game.

I never review games, but I felt that this one deserved it. I strongly suggest playing the first title before diving into this one, but either way this game is a masterpiece. Great narrative and great game play too. The level design is phenomenal and I felt attached to the story the whole way through, this is one of those games that I can't stop thinking about playing until I've finished it. All around well worth the price, and an experience I doubt i'll forget anytime soon.

La intrinseca complejidad del entramado al cual reconocemos como la historia y la relevancia que tienen sus enseÃ±anzas para aplicar a nivel personal.
Tal vez no sea el mejor juego de la historia, pero definitivamente es el tipo de juego que todos debemos jugar alguna vez.
